title: holsten beer logo font?
content:
Hello,

What font is used to write HOLSTEN? Or big customization is used there?

Thanks in advance.

Ž.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [B\_Holsten Premium Bier.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013074519/http:/typophile.com/files/B_Holsten%20Premium%20Bier.jpg) | 15.5 KB |
author: zydrius

comments.content:
Thanks.

Strange, i cannot find it here with search field..? Why?

And how You Florian found it?

Žydrius.

Because the built-in search is broken. You can search typophile.com (via Google) with this [bookmarklet/favelet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013074519/http:/typophile.com/node/12436), created by [Grant Hutchinson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013074519/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Grant%20Hutchinson). Makes finding those older threads a lot easier: [http://www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20holsten](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013074519/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20holsten "http://www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20holsten")
